Articles.Content:
Post the funniest thing that has happened to you in Kerbal Space Program. Pictures of the funny sight would be recommended. But you can still tell your funny tale.

Here is a short example: GUYS! \'When I landed on the Mun, I crashed and all the pieces formed a smiley face!\'

I know that wasn\'t very funny, but I hope you guys get the idea. ;D

My rocket fell over on the launch pad and blew up. When my vision cleared, I could see underground, and under the launch pad was a n ocean piled high with spacecraft debris.

Incidentally, all of that debris is from one rocket. I attempted to make a tower of fuselages to raise my rocket up really high so the launch air resistance would be lower. It didn\'t work.
Have you ever heard someone say \'Yerman Sausage\'?
The funniest thing that happened to me was, I was using regular landing legs, and when I landed on the Mun I bounced. The legs went through the ground and my ship when like 500 meters in the air.

The funniest thing that happened to me was, I was using regular landing legs, and when I landed on the Mun I bounced. The legs went through the ground and my ship when like 500 meters in the air.

Haha

I think all of us have experienced something similar. And I really want shoes made out of whatever those landing legs are made of, I\'d just hop all over!

I can\'t say I\'ve gone 500 meters though. Did you manage to land it? Or abort and return safely?
Well it wasn\'t 500 meters, but it went very far. Also it was high enough to where I could get control of myself. So I didn\'t crash.
